title: Ticket #811: Eliminate needless string duplication in new param system
description: The new param system (#123) engages in lots of unnecessary string duplication of constant strings, taking potentially sharable text data and copying it into the unsharable heap, leading the process bloat. This duplication should be removed to bring memory usage in line with the old param system.
